resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103487</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103487</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200603</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Algebra.help - Simplifying expressions/equations with exponents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Algebra.help - Vereinfachung von von 
expressions/equations mit Exponenten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Algebra.help - Simplification 
d'expressions/equations avec des exposants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Algebra.help - simplificando expressions/equations
com exponentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Algebra.help - facilitare expressions/equations 
con gli esponenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Algebra.help - που απλοποιούν τις εκφράσεις/τις 
εξισώσεις με τους εκθέτες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Algebra.help - simplificaión de 
expressions/equations con los exponentes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Follow this lesson to review basic exponent manipulation. Worksheets, further lessons, and lists of resources are also available. This resource is part of the Teaching Quantitative Skills in the Geosciences collection. http://serc.carleton.edu/quantskills/</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Folgen Sie dieser Lektion, um grundlegende 
Exponenthandhabung zu wiederholen. Bogen, weitere Lektionen und 
Listen der Betriebsmittel sind auch vorhanden. Dieses 
Hilfsmittel ist ein Teil der Unterricht quantitativen Fähigkeiten in 
der Geosciences Ansammlung http://serc.carleton.edu/quantskills/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Suivez cette leçon pour passer en revue la 
manipulation de base d'exposant. Les tableaux, d'autres leçons,
et les listes de ressources sont également disponibles. Cette 
ressource fait partie des qualifications quantitatives d'enseignement 
dans la collection http://serc.carleton.edu/quantskills/ de 
Geosciences</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Siga esta lição para rever a manipulação 
básica do exponente. As folhas, umas lições mais adicionais, 
e as listas dos recursos estão também disponíveis. Este 
recurso é parte das habilidades quantitative do ensino na coleção 
http://serc.carleton.edu/quantskills/ de Geosciences</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Segua questa lezione per rivedere la manipolazione
di base dell'esponente. I fogli di lavoro, ulteriori lezioni e 
le liste delle risorse sono egualmente disponibili. Questa 
risorsa fa parte delle abilità quantitative di insegnamento 
nell'accumulazione http://serc.carleton.edu/quantskills/ di 
Geosciences</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακολουθήστε αυτό το μάθημα για να αναθεωρήσετε το 
βασικό χειρισμό εκθέτη. Τα φύλλα εργασίας, τα περαιτέρω 
μαθήματα, και οι κατάλογοι στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς είναι επίσης 
διαθέσιμοι. Αυτό το στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς είναι μέρος των 
ποσοτικών δεξιοτήτων διδασκαλίας στη Geosciences συλλογή 
http://serc.carleton.edu/quantskills/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Siga esta lección para repasar la manipulación 
básica del exponente. Las hojas de trabajo, otras lecciones, y 
las listas de recursos están también disponibles. Este recurso
es parte de las habilidades cuantitativas de la enseñanza en la 
colección http://serc.carleton.edu/quantskills/ de Geosciences</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200603</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103487</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/banded-iron-formations</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
